response.original_title: Speedrunnings Greatest Rivalry: Mario Kart 64 - Matthias vs. Dan
response.overview: Rivals: Gamings Greatest Competitors is a video series that covers the greatest rivalries in the history of competitive gaming. The premiere episode features two of the greatest players to ever play Mario Kart 64 and their amazing decade long rivalry that still rages today.
response.title: Speedrunnings Greatest Rivalry: Mario Kart 64 - Matthias vs. Dan
